contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Okres_tvrdosin.png|thumb|right|350px|Location of [[Tvrdošín District]] in the [[Zilina Region]]]] '''Zábiedovo''' is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in [[Tvrdošín District]] in the [[Žilina Region]] of northern [[Slovakia]]. ==History== In [[history|historical records]] the [[village]] was first mentioned in 1567. ==Geography== The [[municipality]] lies at an [[elevation]] of 670 metres and covers an [[area]] of 17.974 km². It has a [[population]] of about 790 people. ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Tvrdosin District}} {{Žilina-geo-stub}} {{coord|49|19|N|19|37|E|region:SK_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Tvrdošín District|Zabiedovo]]
